column4: were there some downgrades for the partition manager on install from ubuntu 7 to 8?
I remember being able to resize directly from the installer before, not so now?

the "7" and "8" in recent version numbers refer to their year of release. There are two different versions of Ubuntu with each number: 7.04, 7.10, 8.04, 8.10. And you should still be able to resize from the installer: i did it the other day =/
hmm gave me hell today I decided to try out ubuntu as a desktop (love the server!) and managed to entirely toast my windows partition
